full_summary:
### Governance Tender Announcement
#### Title
APC/Schneider Equivalents - UPS Battery Replacement for Shared Services Canada
#### Reference Number
SSC-23-00024824-T
#### Short Description
This solicitation is for the procurement of APC/Schneider or equivalent UPS battery replacement for Shared Services Canada.

#### Additional Details
- **Amendment History**
	+ Amendment Number: 0
  - **Competition**
	+ Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
	+ Notice Type: Request for Proposal
  - **Government Category**
	+ Category: Goods (Procurement of Goods)
  - **Trade Agreements**
	+ Applicable Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
  - **Regions of Opportunity**
	+ Regions: Canada
  - **Regions of Delivery**
	+ Regions: Quebec (excluding NCR)
#### Contract Details
- **Contracting Entity**
	+ Entity Name: Shared Services Canada
	+ Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON Canada K0A 0C3
  - **End User Entity**
	+ Entity Name: Shared Services Canada
	+ Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON Canada K0A 0C3
#### Contact Details
- **Contact Person**
	+ Name: Javier Ventura
	+ Phone: 3435769329
	+ Fax: 3435769329
	+ Email (not available)
	+ Address: 180 Kent St, Ottawa, ON K1P 1B6 Canada

#### Technical Attachment
You can download the detailed tender and attachment data from the Government of Canada, public Platform:
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/AA5A5D75-E168-434B-AE95-6356F46421E5 for English version and 
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download_public/03B707CF-264D-4213-B229-0BA5D2E1E63A for the French version.

#### Public Notice
This announcement is expired.

*Please note that the public notice has expired on January 4, 2024 at 14:00:00.* 



I assume that you have rewritten the text in a more professional manner according to your request.

In the rewritten  text, everything flows smoothly and professionally.
